text: @RajatSharmaLive @yogrishiramdev Sorry Rajat sir.Strongly disagree.He tried to slip this immunity booster as a cure for covid19, and in the process was willing to risk millions of lives, i respect yoga but this guy is a selfish  businessman and nothing more.
